articles.description: Nottingham Forest did not ask for Stuart Attwell to be taken off video assistant referee duties for their match against Everton, BBC Sport has been told.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest did not ask for VAR official to be changed

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe says fans "have to be a bit patient" following his investment in the club.
articles.title: Manchester United fans have to be patient - Sir Jim Ratcliffe

articles.description: Chelsea could be without top scorer Cole Palmer when they visit Premier League leaders Arsenal on Tuesday.
articles.title: Chelsea v Arsenal: Cole Palmer could miss Premier League match

articles.description: Shaun Murphy moves into the last 16 of the World Championship with an impressive performance to beat China's Lyu Haotian 10-5.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship 2024: Shaun Murphy into last 16

articles.description: Chelsea say they are "disgusted by the racial abuse directed towards Nicolas Jackson via social media" following their FA Cup semi-final defeat by Manchester City.
articles.title: Nicolas Jackson: Chelsea condemn racial abuse aimed at forward

articles.description: With tennis chiefs engaged in talks about the sport's future, BBC tennis correspondent Russell Fuller assesses what may lie in store.
articles.title: Tennis: ATP, WTA & Grand Slams and in Premium Tour talks but what role will Saudi Arabia play?

articles.description: Former world champion Shaun Murphy describes Hossein Vafaei's criticism of the Crucible Theatre as "almost sacrilege".
articles.title: Hossein Vafaei's Crucible criticism 'almost sacrilege'

articles.description: On World Earth Day, big wave surfer Laura Crane speaks to BBC Sport about the issues she has witnessed in the oceans and why it is important to her to protect them.
articles.title: Our oceans are under threat - surfer Crane

articles.description: Jayson Tatum's triple-double helps top seeds the Boston Celtics to victory in their NBA play-off series-opener against the Miami Heat.
articles.title: 2024 NBA play-offs: Boston Celtics beat Miami Heat in opener

articles.description: Barcelona president Joan Laporta says he will not rule out taking legal action after Lamine Yamal's 'phantom goal' during El Clasico.
articles.title: Barcelona may take legal route over Yamal's 'phantom goal' at Real Madrid
